DataSourcePortable.Name: LIVROS POR SEXO
DataSourcePortable.Content: <DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT TOP 5 LIVRO, COUNT(*) C FROM EMPRESTIMOS GROUP BY LIVRO" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="LIVRO" From="A" Path="LIVRO" /> <Field Alias="C" From="A" Path="C" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
